snippet: Criticized on sports talk radio for going on paternity leave for the birth of his son, he said it was the right choice and that he had the backing of his team.
lead_paragraph: Criticized on sports talk radio for going on paternity leave for the birth of his son, he said it was the right choice and that he had the backing of his team.

headline.main: Mets’ Murphy Discusses Fatherhood at White House Meeting
headline.print_headline: Mets’ Murphy Discusses Fatherhood at White House Meeting
